query:
-- 检查授权记录
SELECT sp.*, u.username, su.name as stock_user_name 
FROM stockUserPermissions sp
LEFT JOIN users u ON sp.userId = u.id
LEFT JOIN stockUsers su ON sp.stockUserId = su.id
WHERE sp.userId = 2;

-- 检查股票客户状态
SELECT id, name, status FROM stockUsers WHERE id = 1;
